meanings.definition: To remove a belt or seatbelt.
meanings.sent1: She quickly unbelting her seatbelt before getting out of the car.
meanings.sent2: Remember to unbelting your belt before going through airport security.
meanings.sent3: After unbelting his belt, he felt a sense of freedom.
meanings.sent4: The magician unbelting the rope, setting the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, she unbelting the belt and stepped out of the car.

meanings.definition: The act of undoing a belt or seatbelt.
meanings.sent1: The unbelting of the seatbelt signaled the end of the car ride.
meanings.sent2: His unbelting of the belt was a relief after a long journey.
meanings.sent3: The unbelting of the belt became a daily ritual for him.
meanings.sent4: The unbelting of the seatbelt was like releasing a safety barrier.
meanings.sent5: The sound of unbelting echoed through the quiet car interior.
